import logo from "./logo.svg"; import { useState,useEffect} from "react" import "./App.css"; import axios from 'axios'; function App() { const [term, setTerm] = useState('') const [result, setResult] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { console.log("useEffct") const Search = async() => { const response = await axios.get("https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php", { params: { action: 'query', list: 'search', srsearch: term, origin: '*', format: 'json' } }); setResult(response.data.query.search) } if (term) { Search(); } },[]) return (
setTerm(e.target.value)} value={term} >
# First Last Handle
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
{/*

Edit src/App.js and save to reload.

Learn React
*/}
); } export default App;
